thread.title: Multi-Platinum Artist Carly Rae Jepsen's "Run Away with Me" Music Video is Now an Interlude Interactive Experience
thread.title_full: Multi-Platinum Artist Carly Rae Jepsen's "Run Away with Me" Music Video is Now an Interlude Interactive Experience

author: admin
title: Multi-Platinum Artist Carly Rae Jepsen's "Run Away with Me" Music Video is Now an Interlude Interactive Experience
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/23/2015 @ 3:00 AM   Interlude 
NEW YORK -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Interlude, a media and technology company that is pioneering a new kind of video that responds to a person’s emotions and interests, has launched a reimagining of multi-platinum GRAMMY® nominated artist Carly Rae Jepsen’s “Run Away with Me” video that can be enjoyed as an interactive experience. The original video was launched in July. Interlude worked with Interscope Records and SB Projects to develop a version which allows fans to participate in how the video unfolds. This is the first time Interlude has recreated an existing music video into their interactive format. 
The new Interlude interactive music video includes brand new exclusive content featured for the first time in the new interactive video. It gives Carly’s fans the opportunity to experience her journey with her. Through a series of text messages and emojis, viewers get the chance to be active participants in what she does, how she feels, where she travels to, how she spends her spare time: Ride a skateboard? Go to Paris? Sing Karaoke? This is all a conversation that each individual viewer has with Jepsen. Each experience is uniquely tailored to each viewer’s choices. 
“Working with label and management partners to craft unique video experiences, Interlude is focused on creating new opportunities for artists and fans to engage,” said Brian Harris Frank, President, Interlude Music. “It’s early days, but this video is an example of the potential to dramatically change the dynamics of music videos. We are eager to be a part of the evolution of music industry and see some very interesting marketing opportunities through our platform.” 
The new Interlude Interactive video experience is available now at https://www.carlyraemusic.com/runawaywithme . 
About Interlude 
Interlude ( www.interlude.fm ) is pioneering a new form of media in which video can respond to a person’s actions and interests in real-time. Stories told using our patented technology platform can adapt in a multitude of directions; like in a video game, the viewer steps into the story to make choices that affect dialogue, and even the plot, at any particular moment in time. This means that viewers are offered nearly infinite experiences in live-action video within a single piece of content. The result is highly engaging game-like videos that consumers play over and over. We partner with entertainment companies, independent creators, and top brands to create episodic series that are distributed widely through a network of affiliates on the mobile web, mobile apps, and the web. Interlude investors include Sequoia Capital, NEA, Intel Capital, Marker, and Innovation Endeavors. The company is based in New York, NY with additional offices in Tel Aviv, Israel and Los Angeles, CA. Editors, note: All trademarks and registered trademarks are those of their respective companies. Additional background information is available at www.roeder-johnson.com .
